answers.answer: My doc said if any swelling occurs in my face or neck that's when I call, maybe you should just to be safe.
My aunt swelled up real bad the day before she went into labor. Like the other person said you should probably call your doctor first thing in the morning.

My Dr also told me if I had swelling in my face and kneck to call right away because thats a sign of preeclampsia...If you have a headache even if its dull or your vision gets bright lights or blurry you need to get to the hospital ASAP!
I would go to the hospital, sounds like preeclampsia
Thanks, I got tested for that and all. I woke up & the swelling is gone, but I'm going to keep an eye on it.

question: Hi! My due date is tomorrow :) but, I look like a balloon. My feet and ankles have doubled in size and are so sore, my dad & hubby said my legs look at bigger, my face is a little swollen and my hands are starting to swell. Is this normal? I told my hubby if I'm still swollen in the morning, I'm going to call my doctor. But I'm just wondering if this has happened to anyone else! Thanks.
title: swollen like a balloon...
